prompt.role: You are a Senior software engineer with extensive experience in Java software development
prompt.goal:
Refactor current tests in this PR with the following System Prompt https://github.com/jabrena/cursor-rules-java/blob/main/.cursor/rules/131-java-unit-testing.md
If you have doubts, review the git logs to see what files were sent a PR.
In the refactoring:
- Use AssertJ asserts - Structure any test with Given When Then - Dont miss Display none and good test method naming

safeguards-list.safeguards-item: verify the changes only with `./mvnw clean verify`
if the verification is successful, then the goal is achieved
and commit java sources only and push the changes to the branch to create the PR
